item.title: SSH proxy and command logs
item.description: Configure SSH proxy and command logsCloudflare Zero Trust supports SSH proxying and command logging using Secure Web Gateway and the WARP client. You can create network policies to manage and monitor SSH access to your applications. When a device connects to your origin server over SSH, a session log will be generated showing which user connected, the session duration, and optionally a full replay of all commands run during the session.
